name: Hope The Movie First Ever Short NFT Film

metadata.name: Hope The Movie (First Ever Short NFT Film)
metadata.description:
Hope The Movie (First Ever Short Animated NFT Film)
by Ijlal Aslam.

"Don't feel sad because of the small failures in your life. Everyday we get a chance to be a better person, we get a chance to follow our dreams.Don't lose HOPE and never give up!

HIGHLIGHTS

*First Ever Short Animated NFT Film
*This short animation film is a mixture of both 2D and 3D elements.
*The character animation was done (frame by frame) entirely
*Created in a ‘one-take-shot’ style.
*Created entirely with a silhouette theme.
